My Projects

A collection of robotics, AI, and mechatronics projects showcasing my expertise and innovation.

Autonomous Delivery Robot

A fully autonomous robot designed to navigate indoor environments and deliver items to specific locations.

ROS2 Computer Vision SLAM C++

AI-Powered Robotic Arm

A robotic arm that uses deep learning to identify and pick up objects of various shapes and sizes.

PyTorch ROS Python Computer Vision

Drone Navigation System

A vision-based navigation system for drones that enables autonomous flight in GPS-denied environments.

OpenCV Machine Learning C++ Python

Human-Robot Interaction Framework

A framework for natural interaction between humans and robots using gesture recognition and voice commands.

TensorFlow NLP ROS Python

Smart Manufacturing Robot Cell

An integrated robotic cell for smart manufacturing with real-time quality control and adaptive process optimization.

ROS2 Industrial Automation Computer Vision Machine Learning

Multi-Robot Coordination System

A system that enables multiple robots to coordinate their actions and work together to accomplish complex tasks.

ROS2 Multi-agent Systems Python C++

Neural Network Control System

A neural network-based control system for non-linear dynamic systems, applied to robotic manipulators.

PyTorch Control Theory Python MATLAB

Autonomous Agriculture Robot

An agricultural robot capable of autonomous navigation, crop monitoring, and selective harvesting.

ROS Computer Vision Machine Learning Sensor Fusion

Real-time Object Detection System

A high-performance object detection system optimized for embedded devices in robotics applications.

TensorFlow Lite Computer Vision C++ CUDA
